name: ConQuest (itch) (samrerap)
description:
The Avazan empire has come to your homeland, the Roun, forcefully trying to conquer it. As the commander of the Roun, you must protect the capital city from Avazan forces. You’ve got this, as long as they don’t suddenly have a ton of super powerful allies on their side. That’ll never happen though, right?

Place towers with a click- and a cost. Manage your gold with buying towers, or the Avazan will steal it all! 

Pressing the 'C' key can turn the tides, allowing you to view the battlefield, and your enemies' path!

Get in the way of the Avazan, and their masterful navigators will push past your defenses!

Protect the enchanted plains of the Roun, or face crushing defeat!
